thread.title: Huskies trying to ride momentum into a win streak
thread.title_full: Huskies trying to ride momentum into a win streak

author: ED DAIGNEAULT REPUBLICAN-AMERICAN
title: Huskies trying to ride momentum into a win streak
text:
Saturday, October 17, 2015 1:05 AM EDT 
Huskies trying to ride momentum into a win streak BY ED DAIGNEAULT REPUBLICAN-AMERICAN Connecticut running back Arkeel Newsome (22) passes Tulane defenders for a large gain during an NCAA college football game in New Orleans, Saturday, Oct. 11, 2014. (AP Photo/The New Orleans Advocate, A.J. Sisco) NO SALES; MAGAZINES OUT; INTERNET OUT; TV OUT; NO FOREIGNS. LOUISIANA BUSINESS INC. OUT (INCLUDING GREATER BATON ROUGE BUSINESS REPORT; 225; 10/12; INREGISTER; LBI CUSTOM); MANDATORY CREDIT Browse for Republican American Reprints STORRS â€” UConn has an opportunity sitting in front of it that it has not had in some time. The next trick is to take advantage of it.The Huskies received some mental reinforcement last week at Central Florida, clubbing the Knights, 40-13. That came on the heels of three straight defeats that could have pushed the Huskies into the tank.
